item.title: Presenting to Public Audience with Chrissie Atkinson
item.description: What people are hoping to get out of this workshop: Social media content Ways to gauge your audience and check whether your message is landing Gain confidence in presenting Audience Think about age of your audience - Are children involved? Is it mostly adults? Content Remember to introduce yourself, makes the connection feel more human Set expectation about when to ask question. Start telling the audience when you are planning to take questions.

item.title: Getting rich slowly notes from TE&E Time at RSB
Responding to Reviewers
item.description: Notes from TE&E How to respond to reviewer? 2021-09-22 Be polite “This should be review by native English speaker!” • Be careful. • Don’t react to rudeness with rudeness. Pet peeves: • Carelessness in response letters • Figure cross reference wrong (eg. Figure 5 doesn’t refer to Figure 5!) Tips for responding: • Make it easiest for the reviewers and editors as possible to see that you have done to address the comments.
